column1: helen t. dorsey| a funeral mass for helen theresa dorsey
column4: will be held at the church of the blessed sacrament
column8: 2015 with fr. jonathan wilson as celebrant. interment will follow in cedar hill cemetery. helen
column9: a lifelong parishioner of the church of the blessed sacrament
column10: died at her home on wednesday
column12: 2015 with her family and friends by her side. she was born in newark
column14: 1923 to the late victor and margaret (ferenz) lukasko. helen was a 1941 graduate of st. francis de sales high school. she attended the newark school of nursing and became an rn
column15: teaching courses at the school and working as a surgical nurse at the newark hospital. in 1952 helen joined the practice of r. g. plummer m. d.
column16: and worked as an office nurse for the next 33 years until her retirement. she is survived by her son
column21: linda allen; and many nieces and nephews. in addition to her parents
column22: helen was preceded in death by her husband
column24: leo j. and raymond p. (june) lukasko; and her sister
column25: mary margaret (harvey b.) smith. friends and family may call from 5-7 p. m.
column31: where a vigil service will be held at 6:30 p. m. in lieu of flowers
column32: the family requests memorial donations to the foundation for hospice of central ohio
column35: ohio 43058. to share your memory of helen or leave a condolence for the family
